|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [applyColour\_(\_curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.applycolour_.md) |  | Apply the marker's colour. |
|  [createDomInternal\_()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.createdominternal_.md) |  | Create the marker SVG. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of this marker. |
|  [draw(oldNode, curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.draw.md) |  | Update the marker. |
|  [getBlinkProperties\_()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.getblinkproperties_.md) |  | Get the properties to make a marker blink. |
|  [getMarker()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.getmarker.md) |  | Get the marker. |
|  [getSvgRoot()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.getsvgroot.md) |  | Return the root node of the SVG or null if none exists. |
|  [hide()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.hide.md) |  | Hide the marker. |
|  [isCursor()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.iscursor.md) |  | True if the marker should be drawn as a cursor, false otherwise. A cursor is drawn as a flashing line. A marker is drawn as a solid line. |
|  [positionBlock\_(width, markerOffset, markerHeight)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positionblock_.md) |  | Position the marker for a block. Displays an outline of the top half of a rectangle around a block. |
|  [positionInput\_(connection)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positioninput_.md) |  | Position the marker for an input connection. Displays a filled in puzzle piece. |
|  [positionLine\_(x, y, width)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positionline_.md) |  | Move and show the marker at the specified coordinate in workspace units. Displays a horizontal line. |
|  [positionOutput\_(width, height, connectionShape)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positionoutput_.md) |  | Position the marker for an output connection. Displays a puzzle outline and the top and bottom path. |
|  [positionPrevious\_(width, markerOffset, markerHeight, connectionShape)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positionprevious_.md) |  | Position the marker for a previous connection. Displays a half rectangle with a notch in the top to represent the previous connection. |
|  [positionRect\_(x, y, width, height)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.positionrect_.md) |  | Move and show the marker at the specified coordinate in workspace units. Displays a filled in rectangle. |
|  [setParent\_(newParent)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.setparent_.md) |  | Attaches the SVG root of the marker to the SVG group of the parent. |
|  [showAtLocation\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showatlocation_.md) |  | Update the marker's visible state based on the type of curNode.. |
|  [showCurrent\_()](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showcurrent_.md) |  | Show the current marker. |
|  [showWithBlock\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithblock_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a block. |
|  [showWithCoordinates\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithcoordinates_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a workspace coordinate. This is a horizontal line. |
|  [showWithField\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithfield_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a field. This is a box around the field. |
|  [showWithInput\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithinput_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for an input. This is a puzzle piece. |
|  [showWithNext\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithnext_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a next connection. This is a horizontal line. |
|  [showWithOutput\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithoutput_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for an output connection. |
|  [showWithPrevious\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithprevious_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a previous connection. |
|  [showWithStack\_(curNode)](./blockly.blockrendering.markersvg.showwithstack_.md) |  | Position and display the marker for a stack. This is a box with extra padding around the entire stack of blocks. |
